alert.note: Alert for Eastern Columbia; Eastern Dutchess; Eastern Greene; Eastern Ulster; Western Columbia; Western Dutchess; Western Greene; Western Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 4:00AM EST until January 05 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Light mixed precipitation including pockets of freezing rain and freezing drizzle expected. Total ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Columbia, Dutchess, Greene and Ulster counties of east central New York, the Berkshires of western Massachusetts and Litchfield County of northwestern Connecticut. * WHEN...Through 11 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact travel through the morning hours.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Columbia; Eastern Dutchess; Eastern Greene; Eastern Ulster; Western Columbia; Western Dutchess; Western Greene; Western Ulster
